title: The Trinity of Consistency as a Defining Principle for General World Models
abstract: World Models require three consistency principles—modal, spatial, and temporal—for general artificial intelligence, with a proposed benchmark evaluating multimodal learning systems.
summary_en: World Models require three consistency principles—modal, spatial, and temporal—for general artificial intelligence, with a proposed benchmark evaluating multimodal learning systems.
summary_zh: 世界模型需要模态、空间和时间三种一致性原则以实现通用人工智能，并提出了一个评估多模态学习系统的基准。
